item.description: Overview Tobler’s first law of geography states that “everything is related to everything else, but near things are more related than distant things.

item.title: A State of Being
item.description: Studying Covid-19’s Effect on Community Vulnerability in Massachusetts The Covid-19 crisis has exposed the weak hidden foundations upon which our ‘prosperous’ society was built, and exacerbated visible ones.
